Summary: Grouping of 9 bullet-shaped lights in Alexandria,
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile walking, a woman observed three groupings of three lights each movingacross the sky at 45 degrees, about 2,000 feet altitude and perhaps a half-miledistant. All nine lights were shaped like the head of a bullet, white with ared-orange rim. The lead groups lights were larger than those of the groupstrailing to the left and right. No sound was heard. After 15 seconds, all lightswinked out. The witness impression was of three separate vehicles, each withthree lights, though no overal structure was discerned.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Alexandria
There were no other sightings in Alexandria on or around November 17th 1999
